mapper.select: select count(product_id) from t_sys_slideshow where product_id=#{goodsId} and is_deleted=0
select count(sort) from t_sys_slideshow where sort=#{sort} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update:

and a.image_status like concat('%', #{slideshowStatus}, '%')
